frame.frame_description_en: This frame describes a situation where a Graduate finishes an educational program at an Institution and is officially recognized as having completed it. The Graduate may receive a Degree, often after completing certain Requirements in a particular Field_of_study. The completion can be marked by an Event, and it can be located in Time and Place.
frame.frame_description_html: This frame describes a situation where a Graduate finishes an educational program at an Institution and is officially recognized as having completed it. The Graduate may receive a Degree, often after completing certain Requirements in a particular Field_of_study. The completion can be marked by an Event, and it can be located in Time and Place.

elements.name: Graduate
elements.description_en: The person who finishes the studies and is recognized as having completed them.
elements.description_html: The person who finishes the studies and is recognized as having completed them.

elements.name: Institution
elements.description_en: The school, university, or program where the Graduate studied and from which they finish.
elements.description_html: The school, university, or program where the Graduate studied and from which they finish.

elements.name: Degree
elements.description_en: The qualification or diploma that the Graduate is awarded for completing the program.
elements.description_html: The qualification or diploma that the Graduate is awarded for completing the program.

elements.name: Field_of_study
elements.description_en: The subject area that the Graduate studied in the program.
elements.description_html: The subject area that the Graduate studied in the program.

elements.name: Requirements
elements.description_en: The conditions that must be completed in order to graduate (for example credits, exams, or a thesis).
elements.description_html: The conditions that must be completed in order to graduate (for example credits, exams, or a thesis).

elements.name: Event
elements.description_en: The graduation ceremony or other occasion that marks the completion.
elements.description_html: The graduation ceremony or other occasion that marks the completion.

elements.name: Time
elements.description_en: When the graduation (or the graduation Event) happens.
elements.description_html: When the graduation (or the graduation Event) happens.

elements.name: Place
elements.description_en: Where the graduation or the graduation Event happens.
elements.description_html: Where the graduation or the graduation Event) happens.

frame.note_on_roles_en: A frame can have one role or many roles. A sentence can mention only some roles.
